languages.text: "Оно не мертво. Мертво, но мертво неправильно. Совсем не..." {n}Кибелла опускает голову, будто устыдившись собственной сбивчивости, и кладет руку на оружие.{/n} "Я прошу дозволения исправить Это".

"It is not dead. It is dead, but in the wrong way. It's not—" {n}Kibellah bows her head as if ashamed of her muddled explanation, then places a hand on her weapon.{/n} "I ask your permission to fix... that."
languages.original_text: "Оно не мертво. Мертво, но мертво неправильно. Совсем не..." {n}Кибелла опускает голову, будто устыдившись собственной сбивчивости, и кладет руку на оружие.{/n} "Я прошу дозволения исправить Это".

"It is not dead. It is dead, but in the wrong way. It's not—" {n}Kibellah bows her head as if ashamed of her muddled explanation, then places a hand on her weapon.{/n} "I ask your permission to fix... that."

languages.text: «No está muerto. Lo está, pero no correctamente. No está...». {n}Kibellah inclina la cabeza, como si le avergonzara el galimatías de su explicación, y se lleva la mano al arma.{/n} «Le pido que me permita arreglar... eso».
languages.original_text: "It is not dead. It is dead, but in the wrong way. It's not—" {n}Kibellah bows her head as if ashamed of her muddled explanation, then places a hand on her weapon.{/n} "I ask your permission to fix... that."

traits.locale_text: «No está muerto. Lo está, pero no correctamente. No está...». {n}Kibellah inclina la cabeza, como si le avergonzara el galimatías de su explicación, y se lleva la mano al arma.{/n} «Le pido que me permita arreglar... eso».

languages.text: 「死んではいません。死んでいるけど、死に方が間違っています。これは…」{n}キベラは自分の混乱した説明を恥じるかのように頭を下げ、武器に手を乗せた。{/n}「それを…直す許可が欲しいです」
languages.original_text: "It is not dead. It is dead, but in the wrong way. It's not—" {n}Kibellah bows her head as if ashamed of her muddled explanation, then places a hand on her weapon.{/n} "I ask your permission to fix... that."

traits.locale_text: 「死んではいません。死んでいるけど、死に方が間違っています。これは…」{n}キベラは自分の混乱した説明を恥じるかのように頭を下げ、武器に手を乗せた。{/n}「それを…直す許可が欲しいです」

languages.text: “它没有死。它已经死了，但死亡的方式不对，它不该——”{n}绮贝菈低下头，似乎为自己语无伦次感到羞愧。随后，她将手搭在了武器上。{/n}“我请求你允许我……纠正这个错误。”
languages.original_text: "It is not dead. It is dead, but in the wrong way. It's not—" {n}Kibellah bows her head as if ashamed of her muddled explanation, then places a hand on her weapon.{/n} "I ask your permission to fix... that."

traits.locale_text: “它没有死。它已经死了，但死亡的方式不对，它不该——”{n}绮贝菈低下头，似乎为自己语无伦次感到羞愧。随后，她将手搭在了武器上。{/n}“我请求你允许我……纠正这个错误。”

languages.text: "Es ist nicht tot. Es ist tot, aber auf die falsche Art. Es ist nicht ..." {n}Kibellah senkt den Kopf, als schäme sie sich für ihre schwammige Erklärung, und legt dann eine Hand auf ihre Waffe.{/n} "Ich bitte um Erlaubnis ... das in Ordnung zu bringen."
languages.original_text: "It is not dead. It is dead, but in the wrong way. It's not—" {n}Kibellah bows her head as if ashamed of her muddled explanation, then places a hand on her weapon.{/n} "I ask your permission to fix... that."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist nicht tot. Es ist tot, aber auf die falsche Art. Es ist nicht ..." {n}Kibellah senkt den Kopf, als schäme sie sich für ihre schwammige Erklärung, und legt dann eine Hand auf ihre Waffe.{/n} "Ich bitte um Erlaubnis ... das in Ordnung zu bringen."

languages.text: « Cette chose n'est pas encore morte. Ou plutôt si, mais pas de la bonne manière. Elle n'est pas... » {n}Kibellah baisse la tête comme si elle avait honte de ses explications confuses, puis elle pose une main sur son arme.{/n} « Je vous demande humblement la permission de... rectifier le tir. »
languages.original_text: "It is not dead. It is dead, but in the wrong way. It's not—" {n}Kibellah bows her head as if ashamed of her muddled explanation, then places a hand on her weapon.{/n} "I ask your permission to fix... that."

traits.locale_text: « Cette chose n'est pas encore morte. Ou plutôt si, mais pas de la bonne manière. Elle n'est pas... » {n}Kibellah baisse la tête comme si elle avait honte de ses explications confuses, puis elle pose une main sur son arme.{/n} « Je vous demande humblement la permission de... rectifier le tir. »

languages.text: "Ölü değil. Ölmüş ancak yanlış yoldan ölmüş. O..." {n}Kibellah, âdeta karman çorman açıklamasından utanmışçasına başını eğiyor. Ardından elini silahına götürüyor.{/n} "Bunu düzelmek için... Müsaadeni istiyorum."
languages.original_text: "It is not dead. It is dead, but in the wrong way. It's not—" {n}Kibellah bows her head as if ashamed of her muddled explanation, then places a hand on her weapon.{/n} "I ask your permission to fix... that."
